search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Firebase / Firestore (firebase.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Firebase Firestore can be found at: [https://firebase.google.com/pricing](https://firebase.google.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
[Skip to main content](https://firebase.google.com/pricing#main-content)

Stay organized with collections Save and categorize content based on your preferences.

#### Pricing plans

Get started at no cost,  
then pay as you go.
---------------------------------------------

| Products
 | No-cost

##### Spark Plan

Generous limits to get started

[Start now](https://console.firebase.google.com/project/_/overview?purchaseBillingPlan=no-cost) | Pay as you go

##### Blaze Plan

[Calculate pricing for apps at scale](https://firebase.google.com/pricing#blaze-calculator)

[Select plan](https://console.firebase.google.com/project/_/overview?purchaseBillingPlan=metered) No-cost usage from Spark plan included\* |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 

#### A/B Testing

 | No-cost |
| 

#### Analytics

 | No-cost |
| 

#### App Check

 | No-cost, subject to [quotas and limits](https://firebase.google.com/docs/app-check#quotas_limits) that vary based on attestation provider. |
| 

#### App Distribution

 | No-cost |
| 

#### App Hosting

 |  |  |
| Outgoing BandwidthUncached

Cached

 | _Not applicable_ | Starting June 14th, 2025,  
No cost up to 10 GiB/month, Then...$0.20/GiB

$0.15/GiB

 |
| Storage | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 5 GB  
Then $0.10/GB |
| Cloud Products |  |  |
| Cloud Run | _Not applicable_ | [Cloud Run Pricing](https://cloud.google.com/run/pricing) |
| Cloud Build | _Not applicable_ | [Cloud Build Pricing](https://cloud.google.com/build/pricing) |
| Artifact Registry | _Not applicable_ | [Artifact Registry Pricing](https://cloud.google.com/artifact-registry/pricing) |
| Cloud Logging | _Not applicable_ | [Cloud Logging Pricing](https://cloud.google.com/stackdriver/pricing?db=egilmore#logging-pricing-summary) |
| Cloud Secrets Manager  
 | _Not applicable_ | [Cloud Secrets Manager Pricing](https://cloud.google.com/secret-manager/pricing?db=egilmore) |
| Cloud Calculator | _Not applicable_ | Please reference the Google  
[Cloud calculator](https://cloud.google.com/products/calculator?hl=en) to estimate your project costs. |
| 

#### Authentication

 |  |  |
| Phone Auth - All regions | _Not applicable_ | Billed per SMS sent  
See [current rates](https://cloud.google.com/identity-platform/pricing) |
| Other Authentication services |  |  |
| With Identity Platform |  |  |
| Monthly active users | 50k/month | No-cost up to 50k MAUs  
Then [Google Cloud pricing](https://cloud.google.com/identity-platform/pricing) |
| Monthly active users - SAML/OIDC | 50/month | No-cost up to 50 MAUs  
Then [Google Cloud pricing](https://cloud.google.com/identity-platform/pricing) |
| 

#### Cloud Firestore

 |  |  |
| Stored data | 1 GiB total | No-cost up to 1 GiB total  
Then [Google Cloud pricing](https://cloud.google.com/firestore/pricing) |
| Network egress | 10 GiB/month | No-cost up to 10 GiB/month  
Then [Google Cloud pricing](https://cloud.google.com/firestore/pricing) |
| Document writes | 20K writes/day | No-cost up to 20K writes/day  
Then [Google Cloud pricing](https://cloud.google.com/firestore/pricing) |
| Document reads | 50K reads/day | No-cost up to 50K reads/day  
Then [Google Cloud pricing](https://cloud.google.com/firestore/pricing) |
| Document deletes | 20K deletes/day | No-cost up to 20K deletes/day  
Then [Google Cloud pricing](https://cloud.google.com/firestore/pricing) |
| 

#### Cloud Functions

 |  |  |
| Invocations | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 2M/month  
Then $0.40/million |
| GB-seconds | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 400K/month  
Then [Google Cloud pricing](https://cloud.google.com/functions/pricing) |
| CPU-seconds | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 200K/month  
Then [Google Cloud pricing](https://cloud.google.com/functions/pricing) |
| Outbound networking | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 5 GB/month  
Then $0.12/GB |
| Cloud Build minutes | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 120min/day  
Then $0.003/min |
| Container storage in [Artifact Registry](https://cloud.google.com/artifact-registry) | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 500MB of storage  
Then [Google Cloud pricing](https://cloud.google.com/artifact-registry/pricing)\*Pricing varies based on [location](https://cloud.google.com/functions/docs/locations)

 |
| 

#### Cloud Messaging (FCM)

 | No-cost |
| 

#### Cloud Storage

No-cost limits are enforced daily and refreshed at midnight. On the Blaze plan, fees are based on usage volume:  
• For the default `*.appspot.com` bucket, fees are processed as [Google App Engine usage fees](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/pricing).  
• For the default `*.firebasestorage.app` bucket and any additional buckets, fees are processed as [Google Cloud Storage usage fees](https://cloud.google.com/storage/pricing).





 |  |  |
| ```

            *.appspot.com
           
``` legacy buckets |  |  |
| GB stored | 5 GB | No-cost up to 5 GB  
Then $0.026/GB |
| GB downloaded | 1 GB/day | No-cost up to 1 GB/day  
Then $0.12/GB  
 |
| Upload operations | 20K/day | No-cost up to 20K/day  
Then $0.05/10K |
| Download operations | 50K/day | No-cost up to 50K/day  
Then $0.004/10K |
| Multiple buckets per project |  |  |
|   
```

            *.firebasestorage.app
           
``` and any additional buckets |  | Note: No-cost quotas are only available for buckets in the following regions: `us-central1`, `us-west1`, `us-east1`.

 |
| GB stored | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 5 GB-months  
Then [Cloud Storage pricing](https://cloud.google.com/storage/pricing#regions) |
| GB downloaded | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 100 GB/month  
Then [Cloud Storage pricing](https://cloud.google.com/storage/pricing#regions) |
| Upload operations | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 5K/month  
Then [Cloud Storage pricing](https://cloud.google.com/storage/pricing#regions) |
| Download operations | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 50K/month  
Then [Cloud Storage pricing](https://cloud.google.com/storage/pricing#regions) |
| Multiple buckets per project | _Not applicable_ |  |
| 

#### Crashlytics

 | No-cost |
| 

#### Data Connect

 |  |  |
| Network egress | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 10 GiB/month  
Then [Google Cloud Internet Data Transfer Rate Premium Tier pricing](https://cloud.google.com/vpc/pricing#internet_egress) |
| Operation Count | _Not applicable_ | No-cost up to 250,000 operations per month  
Then $4.00 per million operations |
| Cloud SQL for PostgreSQL | _Not applicable_ | 3 month no cost [trial](https://firebase.google.com/docs/data-connect/pricing) for the first default Cloud SQL instance created using Firebase Data Connect.  
Then [starting as low as $9.37 / month](https://cloud.google.com/products/calculator?dl=CjhDaVE0TXpFd1lUWmhPUzAxTnpJM0xUUmtOemN0WVRreE9DMDROelV4TWpRNE9HSmlOVGtRQVE9PRAHGiQ4MDZDQjk3NS0xM0QwLTRBREUtODkxRS0wMjYzRUY3MUEwMjQ&e=13802955&hl=en) \- pricing varies based on regions and configurations, see [Google Cloud pricing.](https://cloud.google.com/sql/docs/postgres/pricing) |
| 

#### Hosting

 |  |  |
| Storage | 10 GB | $0.026/GB |
| Data transfer | 360 MB/day | $0.15/GB |
| Custom domain & SSL |  |  |
| Multiple sites per project |  |  |
| 

#### In-App Messaging

 | No-cost |
| 

#### Firebase ML

On the Blaze plan, your account's first 1000 Cloud Vision API calls/month have no costs.





 |  |  |
| Custom Model Deployment |  |  |
| Cloud Vision APIs |  | $1.50/K  
(See [Cloud Vision pricing](https://cloud.google.com/vision/#cloud-vision-api-pricing) ) |
| 

#### Performance Monitoring

 | No-cost |
| 

#### Realtime Database

 |  |  |
| Simultaneous connections

You can create multiple database instances to go beyond the 200K concurrent limit. See [Pricing FAQ](https://firebase.google.com/support/faq/#pricing-simultaneous) for more information.



 | 100 | 200k/database |
| GB stored | 1 GB | $5/GB |
| GB downloaded | 10 GB/month | $1/GB |
| Multiple databases per project |  |  |
| 

#### Remote Config

 | No-cost |
| 

#### Test Lab

On the Blaze plan, you are charged for testing time only, rounded up to the nearest minute. See [Quotas and Pricing for Test Lab](https://firebase.google.com/docs/test-lab/usage-quotas-pricing) for more information.





 |  |  |
| Virtual Device Tests | 10 tests/day | No-cost up to 60 min/day  
Then $1/device/hour |
| Physical Device Tests | 5 tests/day | No-cost up to 30 min/day  
Then $5/device/hour |
| [Android Device Streaming](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/android-device-streaming) | Starting on June 1, 2024, for a promotional period: |
|  | 120 no cost minutes per project, per month | 120 no cost minutes per project, per month  
15 cents for each additional minute |
|  | On or around May, 2025, the promotional period will end and billing will be based on the following quota limits: |
|  | 30 no cost minutes per project, per month | 30 no cost minutes per project, per month  
15 cents for each additional minute |
| 

#### Vertex AI in Firebase

 | _Not applicable_ | Billed according to current [Google Cloud pricing](https://firebase.google.com/docs/vertex-ai/quotas-and-pricing#pricing) |
| 

#### Google Cloud

 |  |  |
| BigQuery

On the Spark plan, the BigQuery sandbox gives you no-cost access to the sandbox's [limits](https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/docs/sandbox#limits) .For more information, see [Export project data to BigQuery](https://firebase.google.com/docs/projects/bigquery-export#pricing) .



 |  |  |
| Other IaaS

Firebase is deeply integrated with Google Cloud, allowing you to use Google's Infrastructure-as-a-Service directly within your Firebase project. See [Pricing FAQ](https://firebase.google.com/support/faq/#pricing-cloud) for more information.



 |  |  |
| 

#### Gemini in Firebase

 |  |
| AI assistance in the Firebase console

See the [Firebase docs](https://firebase.google.com/docs/gemini-in-firebase) for more information.



 |
| AI assistance in Crashlytics

See the [Firebase docs](https://firebase.google.com/docs/crashlytics/ai-assistance) for more information.



 |
| AI assistance in Messaging

See the [Firebase docs](https://firebase.google.com/docs/cloud-messaging/ai-insights) for more information.



 |
| AI assistance in Firebase Data Connect

See the [Firebase docs](https://firebase.google.com/docs/data-connect/ai-assistance) for more information.



 |
| AI assistance in Firebase Studio

See the [Firebase docs](https://firebase.google.com/docs/studio/ai-assistance) for more information.



 |
| 

#### Firebase Studio

 |  |
|  |
| Choose a plan

[Looking for the Flame plan?](https://firebase.google.com/support/faq#flame-plan-legacy) | No-cost

##### Spark Plan

[Start now](https://console.firebase.google.com/project/_/overview?purchaseBillingPlan=no-cost) | Pay as you go

##### Blaze Plan

[Select plan](https://console.firebase.google.com/project/_/overview?purchaseBillingPlan=metered) |

\* No-cost usage on Blaze plan is calculated daily. Details differ slightly for Cloud Functions, Firebase ML, Phone Auth, and Test Lab.

For more info, [see the FAQs](https://firebase.google.com/support/faq#pricing) or view our [documentation](https://firebase.google.com/docs/projects/billing/firebase-pricing-plans) on understanding billing.

No-cost usage quotas apply at the project-level, not at the app-level or for individual resources.

* * *

Need to tell us more? \[\[\["Easy to understand","easyToUnderstand","thumb-up"\],\["Solved my problem","solvedMyProblem","thumb-up"\],\["Other","otherUp","thumb-up"\]\],\[\["Missing the information I need","missingTheInformationINeed","thumb-down"\],\["Too complicated / too many steps","tooComplicatedTooManySteps","thumb-down"\],\["Out of date","outOfDate","thumb-down"\],\["Samples / code issue","samplesCodeIssue","thumb-down"\],\["Other","otherDown","thumb-down"\]\],\[\],\[\],\[\]\]

Get started with Firebase at no cost, and then scale worldwide to millions of users, paying only for what you use.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Firebase offers a free tier (Spark Plan) with generous limits and a pay-as-you-go tier (Blaze Plan) for scaling applications.

features: No-cost usage quotas for various Firebase services
No-cost usage from Spark plan included
